From the brand

Our company has an advanced technical force, perfect marketing system and scientific management system, with its advanced design center, modern production base, full marketing service system and efficient logistics and distribution center comes to this integrated enterprise.

[Timer Function]: Comes with built-in auto timer function(6 hrs ON, 18 hrs OFF), to avoid forgetting to turn off the Christmas lights. Just turn on the lights (any lighting mode) at 6 p.m. in the evening, and it will turn off at 12 a.m. at midnight, then auto on at 6 p.m. in the evening, this cycle repeats itself ad infinitum, no need to reset it everyday
[Durable & Safe Green Wire String Lights]: Keep at a low temperature state after lighting up for hours, ensure and maximize the safety. 3 AA Batteries operated, not include batteries. No extra cord or socket required, for safe and convenient use. Battery box to the first LED light: 1ft. Total length(lights string and leading line): 17ft
[IP 44 Waterproof]: The strong construction makes the string lights tough and sturdy, and waterproof designed string lights perfect for Christmas indoor outdoor decorations. The battery case is waterproof IP44, so it can meet normal use outside but not enough to put under water directly
[Great Outdoor Decorations]: Perfect for indoor and outdoor use, like home, bar, garden, patio, balcony, or wherever decorative light is needed. Ideal for Christmas party, Halloween, Valentine’s day, wedding, Home, Window, Bathroom, Thanksgiving day, holiday, shows, restaurant, hotel, commercial building decorations

WATERGLIDE 50 LED Outdoor Christmas Lights, Battery Operated Mini String Lights with 8 Lighting Modes & Timer

Decorate with our 16ft Christmas decorative mini string lights with 50 warm white individual LED bulbs, will give a soft festive feel to your Xmas.

Notes:

1. Do not mix old and new batteries.

2. Do not mix different types of batteries.

3. If you do not use, please remove the batteries before storage.

Specifications:

Light Color: Warm White

LED Count: 50 pcs Each

Total Length (end to end): 17FT Each

String lights: 16FT Each

Waterproof Level: IP44

Power Supply: Battery Powered

Timer: 6 hours on and 18 hours off

Each string is full wave rectified, which eliminates any flickering making these LED Christmas lights bright.

High bright and luminous intensity, good heat dissipation, low light decay, and create romantic life for you.

8 lighting modes for you to choose – Combination, In waves, Sequential, Slow Glow, Chasing/Flash, Slow fade, Twinkle/Flash, Steady on. Comes with built-in auto timer function without setting (6 hrs ON, 18 hrs OFF), to avoid forgetting to turn off the Christmas lights.

Perfect eye-catching accent for your indoor and outdoor Christmas decorations for your garden, pathway, lawn, yard, flowerbed, fence, walkway or anywhere you want, they will create a warm Christmas feel to your space.

Product Description

KAILEDI Christmas Lights

To create the romantic festival atmosphere in each festival or any parties, KAILEDI snowflake string light being widely used in roads, garden hedge, trees of backyard, shop or mall windows, theater, party, stage, room, wedding ourdoor and indoor decorations and other scenes.

Christmas Decorations

The Christmas light is equipped with flexible copper wire, an be folded and bent as any postures.With cute pendants emits a warm glow, create a warm Christmas holiday atmosphere.

Christmas Lights

These snowflake lights are battery operated, no plug and extension cord need, you can put it anywhere you want to place it.

Waterproof / Outdoor Decor

This fairy string lights are waterproof , perfect for outdoor & indoor, holiday, event decoration. (Kindly note that the power adapter is not waterproof, need to place indoor).

The copper wire is flexible and bendable, which means that the string lights can be bent to any shape you want. Best choice for Christmas, birthday, party, wedding, garden and more occasions.

Product Specifications

String length: 19.6ft(=6m)Diameter of each snowflake light: 0.7 inchesEach Snowflake lights are spaced 4 inches.Light color: Warm whiteQuantity of light: 402 light modes: Steady on and flashPower source: 3 AA Battery (Without battery)

Indoor String Lights

40 Independent snowflake. Each snowflake contains an LED that emits a warm white lights, LED light and snowflake are separable.

Cute Snowflake

Christmas string lights with the soft warm white lighting adds an interesting warm white glow to your house dress-up, it will make your Christmas time lovely.

Gift for Christmas

The Christmas light decorations for home are vivid and delicate, they will be very nice and practical gifts for your friends, relatives, neighbors, classmates and more on Christmas days.

★【Innovative Design】40 independent snowflake. Each snowflake contains an LED that emits a warm white light, LED light and snowflake are separable.It will brighten up the dark corner for happiness atmosphere inside or outside.
★【Safety】the snowflakes decorations are made by high quality epoxy resin, and they have been baked in high temperature environment, which gives the snowflake high hardness. LED string light which is not overheat but safe. After hours of use, it will not get hot even if you touch it. Waterproof, energy saving, solid, environmentally friendly.
★【Waterproof Led String Lights Indoor / Outdoor】The waterproof rating of the snowflake light string is IP65, and the battery box is IP44, which allows you to use the lights both indoor and outdoor. Decorate your garden, patio, bedroom or party.
★【2-Modes】 Combination, in waves, sequential, slogs , chasing/flash, slow fade, twinkle/flash, and steady on.

Warranty & Support

Price: $30.49 - $24.17
(as of Nov 29,2022 05:23:34 UTC – Details)

Product Description

2 Pack Motion Sensor Outdoor Lights Battery Powered

Motion Sensor + Light Sensor: In the dark, the light will automatically light up when it senses motion within 16ft(5m). High Brightness: 600LM 6000K white light ensures high brightness lighting in the dark. 360° Adjustable: The light head can be rotated 360 °, you can freely adjust it to the angle you need during installation. Battery Powered: The motion sensor outdoor light is powered by 4 D-cell batteries (not included) and is not charged by wires.

LED Motion Lights Outdoor

Super Bright LED Sensor Light

This motion sensor light has 4 high power LED with 6000K white light. In the outdoor or indoor dark environment, the extremely high brightness of 600LM provides you with perfect lighting.

360° Adjustable Security Light

Our outdoor security light head can be rotated 360°, so you can freely adjust the angle according to your needs.

Outdoor Spotlight Waterproof

The IP65 waterproof spotlight is perfect for outdoor use, and the product material is rust-proof and durable with ABS plastic.

Motion Detector Lights for Outside and Indoor Use

Front door lights

At night, when you come home, the sensor light will turn on automatically, you can open the door more quickly and conveniently.

Garage lights

Garage outdoor security lights to help you see the road better and park easier.

Storage room lights

When you are storing items in a closed storage room, our motion sensor lights can provide you with good lighting.

Stairs lights

This motion sensor light is also suitable for stairs and hallways, so you will not stumble in the dark.

【PIR Sensor Motion Detection】In darkness or at night, the motion sensor lights automatically light up when detect motion within 16 feet (5m). After 30 seconds of no motion detected, the light will automatically turn off.
【Multi-Angle Adjustment】Our outdoor security light head can be rotated 360°, the light base can be swung back and forth 180°, you can freely adjust the angle according to your needs.
【Waterproof and Durable】IP65 waterproof, the material is rust-proof and durable ABS plastic. It provides you with perfect lighting outdoors in rain and snow.
【Battery Powered & Easy Installation】The battery operated outdoor lights powered by 4 D-cell batteries (not included), and the base is fixed to the wall with the included 4 mounting screws.

2 Pack Motion Sensor Outdoor Lights Battery Powered

  • Motion Sensor + Light Sensor: In the dark, the light will automatically light up when it senses motion within 16ft(5m).
  • High Brightness: 600LM 6000K white light ensures high brightness lighting in the dark.
  • 360° Adjustable: The light head can be rotated 360 °, you can freely adjust it to the angle you need during installation.
  • Battery Powered: The motion sensor outdoor light is powered by 4 D-cell batteries (not included) and is not charged by wires.
